column3: IIrc you'd need to update the translations via Transifex, not going to work if you commit here.\n

@MarcoFalke is right. The `*.ts` changes are useless. They need to be made at https://www.transifex.com/bitcoin.

Also please use https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin for trivial non-code changes to avoid trivial PR overflow in the main repository.
Sorry, restored the `*.ts` files to the previous state.\n
@diegoviola: mind closing the PR and reopening on https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin?\nWe should really try to reduce such non-benefit PRs\n
